comments.body: @rmlarsen is there some joint declaration this could be guarded on? (E.g., TF_USE_GPU?) Or an attribute? (E.g., SUPPORTS_NCHW ? - I'm assuming there is not something _that_ specific :) )
We can also address this in follow up, it might likely be there is not something that exactly first this (esp as Christian was happy with the change).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +552,556 @@  for (string data_format : {
         "NHWC",
#if GOOGLE_CUDA || TENSORFLOW_USE_ROCM
             "NCHW"
#endif  // GOOGLE_CUDA || TENSORFLOW_USE_ROCM
